channel.title: Home Page on Community detection and analysis of American news agencies
channel.description: Recent content in Home Page on Community detection and analysis of American news agencies

item.title: Data description
item.description: Our data concists of news articles from Reuters and The New York Times. We specifically chose to work with news articles as there is an apparent connection between a collaboration network of authors and text that they produce together. The data used for this project is a subset of All the News 2.0, which is an expanded version of the original All the News dataset. All the News 2.0 contains 2,677,878 articles with the publications spanning from January 1, 2016 to April 2, 2020.
